Posts.Content: Jul 26, 2011 04:13PM julee_stayin_strong wrote: so, just had my second chemo on Monday the 25th and my hair is really coming out now. had my girls cut the length off in the back, but it is just coming out by the handfulls. What do you guys think i should do??? should i buzz it with a large number, or just pull it all out? HELP??? PLEASE RESPOND!!!
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
how painful mastectomy is and how do you cope up with it? h0petoBC Fearless_One

Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2011 07:56AM julee_stayin_strong wrote: HOPE- so when is your surgery? it's funny because i never have been a hair person. i like to wash and go and i've always complained that it's too thick. and i HATE bras, i can never find one i like. so i'm like... maybe i shouldn't have said these things because God must have been listening and ....well, it's all going to change!!! crazy!!! KEEP YOUR CHIN UP, this is minor compared to what a lot of people are going thru. i look at it like another SPEED BUMP in my life, or something to cross off the BUCKET LIST, or i will have PERKY boobs again and maybe get SKINNY!!! LOL something positive will come after we make it thru all of this CRAP!!!
